TopicTitle: Pimped out Rover By Jolly Roger Aerospace

Articles.Content:
Jolly roger Aerospace presents....

The Koldsmobile Kummer R2 SP

It has the following:

working springy suspension

Hybrid electric/fuel cell technology

Back up RTG's

self righting system (if you roll over)

cool lighting system

seating for 6

over 20 science experiments

action groups set up for Thrustmaster Hotas Flight sticks

Action groups:

2- Neon Lighting

5- Spam Science

6- toggle Self Righting System

7- toggle Ladders

8- Start Fuel Cell

9- High Beam Headlights

10- Low Beam Headlights

Download link:

http://kerbalx.com/JollyRogerAerospace/Koldsmobile-Kummer-R2-SP

Featured on Pimp My Rover:

This Rover works best with the Take Command mod...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/120740-1-0-4-Take-Command-Launch-Kerbals-in-External-Command-Seats-v1-2-Sept-4-2015

Edited September 16, 2015 by greydragon70

The "Kummer"???

I think we just crossed the line of ridiculousness in trying to 'Kerbalize' words by replacing the first letter with K.

The "Kummer"???

I think we just crossed the line of ridiculousness in trying to 'Kerbalize' words by replacing the first letter with K.

Maybe, but it is a version of a Hummer, and it's such a fun rover.

...and the name is only bad if you have a dirty mind.

Maybe, but it is a version of a Hummer, and it's such a fun rover.

...and the name is only bad if you have a dirty mind.

Ah...the Dee Snyder defense: it's only obscene because YOUR mind is in the gutter. LOL

Ah...the Dee Snyder defense: it's only obscene because YOUR mind is in the gutter. LOL

LMAO Am I right though?

LMAO Am I right though?

Not really. I think anyone over 12 is going to have a field day with that name, dirty mind or not.

Its your creation, you call it what you want. My point was more that the trend of 'Kerbalising" names by replacing the first letter with K is borderline ridiculous, and when it results in something like that, it has crossed the border.

Back on the topic of the rover itself, looks like a neat creation. I'm always amazed at the creativity people have using various parts in ways they aren't obviously intended to be used for. For example, using heat radiators as fenders. I wish KSP had stock structural panels that size.
Well I look at it this way, this is a game and not meant to be so serious. I happen to like Kerbalizing things. If someone gets a giggle out of the name, where is the harm?
Looks like the Batmobile. A disco Batmobile!

Looks like the Batmobile. A disco Batmobile!

I have made a bat wing....
